original_text: And it came to pass, when the captains of the chariots perceived that it was not the king of Israel, that they turned back from pursuing him.
korean_text: 병거의 지휘관들이 그가 이스라엘의 왕이 아님을 보고 쫓기를 그치고 돌이켰더라

sentences.original_text: when the captains of the chariots perceived
that it was not the king of Israel
that they turned back from pursuing him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그를 추격하는 것을 그만두고 돌아왔다
